data.title: Breast Cancer Treatment
data.meta_description: Giving Indiana women the strength to endure breast cancer treatment by providing Individualized service and support
data.text:
Recent News See all news

2024 100 Women in 100 Days Coming SOON!

That's right... our all online peer-to-peer fundraising campaign is back for the third year! Beginning July 24, the IWIN community will strive to raise $40,000. In just 100 days, our goal is to provide 100 Hoosiers who are receiving treatment for breast cancer emotional, physical, and financial relief.

Continue Reading

Now Hiring Program Director

Join our team! IWIN is hiring a Program Director. Apply and check out the job description below.

Apply on LinkedIn or Indeed

Continue Reading

2023 100 Women in 100 Days

We are Kicking Off Our 3rd Annual 100 Women in 100 Days Matching Campaign on Monday, June 26th.

Follow along on IWIN's Facebook and Instagram as we highlight 100 resilient survivors and raise funds to support 100 more!

Click here to get more information or to donate!

Continue Reading

From Our Founder

"My dedication to the fight against breast cancer began several years ago with the diagnosis of breast cancer to a very good friend. It was at that time that I realized the impact treatment had on a woman. Due to the fatiguing nature of chemotherapy and the physical limitations of surgery, I recognized that even the simple things in life now became stressors, such as lifting their child and cleaning the house."

- Nancy Shepard, R.N
